description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Pulled Pork With Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mexican Pulled Pork With Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: steamed rice, coriander leaves, sour cream and lime wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, remove and discard any excess fat from pork. Use two forks to roughly shred pork. Return pork to pan, then cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Serve pork over rice with coriander, sour cream and lime wedges.
